Daily: ('Wipe down bathroom counters after getting washed up morning and night',)
('Do a nighttime sweep to put toys, loose papers, and other stray objects in their place',)
Monthly: ('Wipe down and disinfect doorknobs, light switches and TV remotes',)
('Clean and deodorize the microwave (heat a mug of water with a lemon wedge, then wipe down)',)
Three Months: ('Vacuum mattress (every three months) and flip or rotate 180 degrees (every six months)',)
('Clean and condition leather and wood furniture',)
Six Months: ('Empty and clean cabinet and pantry shelves',)
Annually: ('Pull out large appliances and furniture to clean behind and underneath',)
('Have upholstery and drapes professionally cleaned (every two years)',)
